[DQC.IFRS.0080.8700] ifrs-full:ProceedsFromIssueOfSubordinatedLiabilities has a value of -295,000,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProceedsFromIssueOfSubordinatedLiabilities fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : NOK Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/7V6Z97IO7R1SEAO84Q32/2021-12-31/ESEF/NO/0/sb1smn-2021-12-31AR.zip/sb1smn-2021-12-31AR/reports/sb1smn-2021-12-31AR.xhtml 20591

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9543] Comprehensive income with a value of 486,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Profit (loss) and Other comprehensive income ( 499,000,000 + 13,000,000 ) with a value of 512,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis=ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember Unit : NOK Decimals of Comprehensive income : -6 Decimals of Profit (loss) : -6 Decimals of Other comprehensive income : -6

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 00100 - Statement - Consolidated Income Statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. sb1smn:ProfitLossAttributableToEquityCapitalCertificateHolders, sb1smn:ProfitLossAttributableToTheSavingBankReserve, sb1smn:ProfitLossAttributableToAdditionalTier1CapitalHolders, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 00200 - Statement - Consolidated Statements Of Comprehensive Income includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax of -33,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -57,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax that should add to -33,000,000 are comprised of the following:
- IncomeTaxRelatingToComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss 12,000,000 + OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans -49,000,000 + ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax4,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 00200 - Statement - Consolidated Statements Of Comprehensive Income. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax Total Value : -33,000,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/7V6Z97IO7R1SEAO84Q32/2021-12-31/ESEF/NO/0/sb1smn-2021-12-31AR.zip/sb1smn-2021-12-31AR/reports/sb1smn-2021-12-31AR.xhtml 14025
